title: John H. Hubbard
summary: John Hamal Hubbard (born October 6 or 7, 1945) is an American mathematician and professor at Cornell University and the Universit√© de Provence. He is known for the mathematical contributions he made with Adrien Douady in the field of complex dynamics, including a study of the Mandelbrot set.  One of their most important results is that the Mandelbrot set is connected.
